entity.title: PolicyEngine Integration Implementation - Successfully integrated PolicyEngine with daemon core by: 1) Moving PolicyEngine from discarded variable to stored Daemon struct field, 2) Adding get_recent_activities() to MonitoringService to convert eBPF data to ActivityEvents, 3) Creating periodic activity processing task that runs every 5 seconds to process activities through PolicyEngine, 4) Adding DBus methods for external access, 5) Integrating profile changes with PolicyEngine. Result: PolicyEngine is now actively processing activities and making policy decisions with proper DBus interface exposure.
